NCS powered by The Challenge
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
Email about NCS social action days sent to you in error
Dear Parent or Guardian of {!Contact.Name} and {!Contact.FirstName},
You may have received an email earlier today about NCS social action days happening in September. Please ignore this email - it was meant for participants on our summer NCS programmes and was sent to you because of a system error.
We are really sorry for any confusion caused by this.
Pleas rest assured that we are aware you have signed up for {!Contact.FirstName} to take part in our autumn NCS programme.
If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to get in touch with us by emailing contact@ncsthechallenge.org or calling 0203 432 2400.
Once again, we are very sorry for any confusion caused by the previous email.
Yours sincerely, Jo Lunt Customer Services Manager The Challenge
VISIT NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG NOW
